titleStmt.title: J. W. Edwards et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG10427

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p:
Hart Equity & Criminal Court
Commonwealth
vs } Indictment for carrying concealed deadly weapons Judgmnt at April Term 1861 for $50.
D W Whitman

To his excellency B Magoffin Gov of Kentucky. your petitioners citizens of Hart County would respectfully request your excellency to remit the above fine, believing as we do the case is one in which executive clemency may be properly exercised

J. W. Edwards County atty.
J J Lock
Wm Gibson
T C Legett
E. T. Lafferty
Ruf Gavine
P L Harper
Cap Carden
M Everyman
H. S. Shoudy
G. A. Waldeck
J. T. Brown
R. M. Clayton
A M Adair
A. D. Clarke
W. B. Thompson
A V Enlow
J,, A,, Thomas
H B Wilson
Wm, Gardner
J E Lafferty
J A Edwards
D, B. Brown
Wm Knight Jr.
R. T. Munford
H, B. White
John P Lewis
J W Fitzpatrick
Rhod. Hazlip
Geo. R. Jones
Jacob Devon
A. G. Kerr
Thos B Knight
J, B, Chapline
J J Dawson

Hart Eq. Ct
D. W. Whitman
$50
Pet
